name: Grapple (GMTK Game Jam 2019)
description:
A GAME BY PYTHON-B5 AND SAM GORMAN

Grapple is a small Game Boy Metroidvania created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. It has three areas and only one upgrade: a grappling hook. Instead of unlocking other upgrades, you learn different ways to use your grappling hook. Use these new tactics to adventure across the world and find the three tokens, which open the way to the legendary treasure.

Good luck!

CONTROLS:

- left and right arrow keys to move

- space/Z to jump

- X to grapple (arrow keys to choose direction)

- up arrow to interact (doors, save trees, chests, e.t.c.)

NOTES:

- Save trees save your progress if you die, but DO NOT save your progress if you quit the game.

- The minimap is not provided in game, but can be viewed on this page.
